TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComImportAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ComImportAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ComImportAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Indica que el tipo con atributos estaba previamente definido en COM.

span.span: Indicates that the attributed type was previously defined in COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este atributo se puede aplicar a clases o interfaces, aunque la [Tlbimp.exe (importador de biblioteca)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) normalmente aplica automáticamente cuando importa una biblioteca de tipos.You can apply this attribute to classes or interfaces, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it imports a type library. es un atributo personalizado ficticio que indica que se ha definido un tipo en una biblioteca de tipos publicada anteriormente. is a pseudo-custom attribute that indicates that a type has been defined in a previously published type library. Common language runtime trata estos tipos de forma diferente cuando se activa, exportar, forzar y así sucesivamente.The common language runtime treats these types differently when activating, exporting, coercing, and so on. > [!NOTE] > Todos los tipos COM base heredadas por un objeto administrado deben agregar el contador de referencias de subprocesamiento libre (FTM).All base COM types that are inherited by a managed object must aggregate the Free Threaded Marshaller (FTM). No se puede heredar tipos COM que no agreguen el FTM por los objetos administrados.COM types that do not aggregate the FTM can't be inherited by managed objects. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo aplicar el a una declaración de interfaz administrada.The following example demonstrates how to apply the to a managed interface declaration. Aplique este atributo solo cuando se genera un ensamblado de interoperabilidad manualmente en el código fuente y desea simular los metadatos generados por Tlbimp.exe.You apply this attribute only when generating an interop assembly manually in source code, and want to simulate the metadata produced by Tlbimp.exe. [!code-cpp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CPP/codefile2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CS/codefile2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/VB/codefile2.vb#2)]

related.span: TlbImp.exe (Importador de la biblioteca de tipos)
